nodes.bodyText: i believe "all" is unnecessary, we should stick with @bogdan-sava's approach when user doesn't have anything configured it will default to provide access to everything

nodes.bodyText:
I feel like this approach is more "mistake proof". In case someone forgets to configure the permissions for a role it should not get access to everything, the permissions for accessing everything should be given knowingly.
I have discussed this this approach with @bogdan-sava and we agreed that this is a better handling of the "admin" role.
